title: Failed to compile(can't find crate for `std`) using custom toolchain
body:
hello, i installed rust from source on ubuntu 20.04. i compile successfully _hello world_, but when i compile a little complex crate, it report error, how can I solve this problem?
```
wjyl:plc-rel (dev) # cargo build --bin plc_scan --target mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc
   Compiling libc v0.2.137
   Compiling proc-macro2 v1.0.47
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`
  --> /root/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/proc-macro2-1.0.47/build.rs:43:5
   |
43 | use std::env;
   |     ^^^ can't find crate

error[E0463]: can't find crate for `std`
  --> /root/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/proc-macro2-1.0.47/build.rs:44:5
   |
44 | use std::process::{self, Command};
   |     ^^^ can't find crate
……
```

more detail infomation:

```
wjyl:plc-rel (dev) # rustup show                                                                                      
Default host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
rustup home:  /root/.rustup

installed toolchains
--------------------

stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc (default)

active toolchain
----------------

mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc (default)
rustc 1.65.0-dev
```
```
wjyl:plc-rel (dev) # rustup component list --installed
cargo-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
clippy-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
rust-docs-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
rust-std-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
rustc-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
rustfmt-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
```
```
wjyl:plc-rel (dev) # cat /opt/rust1.65.0/lib/rustlib/components                                                          
rust-docs
cargo
rustfmt-preview
clippy-preview
rust-analysis-mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc
rust-src
rustc
rust-std-mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc
```

config.toml


```
changelog-seen = 2

[llvm]

ninja = true

[build]
host = ["x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu"]
target = ["mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc"]
extended = true
tools = ["cargo", "rls", "clippy", "rustfmt", "analysis", "src"]


[install]
prefix = "/opt/rust1.65.0"
sysconfdir = "etc"
docdir = "share/doc/rust"
bindir = "bin"
libdir = "lib"
mandir = "share/man"

[rust]
[target.x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu]
[target.mipsel-unknown-linux-uclibc]
cc = "mipsel-openwrt-linux-uclibc-gcc"
cxx = "mipsel-openwrt-linux-uclibc-c++"
ar = "mipsel-openwrt-linux-uclibc-ar"
linker = "mipsel-openwrt-linux-uclibc-gcc"
[dist]
```
